wpPost.title: Compulsive Hoarder and Squalor Clean Ups in Perth
wpPost.content:
There is a vast difference between keeping items of sentimental value and feeding an addiction that can harm your health. The faster you can identify a hoarding problem, the earlier you can call for a professional hoarding clean up service.

Storing Items with Inconsequential or No Value

It is only after you or your loved one has admitted to a hoarding problem that you can seek for help, but, you need to recognise the symptoms or signs first. People who suffer from a hoarding disorder will keep all kinds of items with a lot of it not having any important value. This can include newspapers, broken appliances, junk mail and a lot of irrelevant things. It can be very difficult to persuade hoarders to dispose of useless items as they think that the items are repairable in the future.

Loss of Space in The House

People who have hoarding disorders are reluctant to throw away old belongings, and they begin to run out of space around the house. Those saved belongings may be organised initially, but eventually they can spread around the house and make your living space uncomfortable and uninhabitable.

Unclean and Disorganised Atmosphere

If you notice that any of your family has so much clutter around the house that there is no sense of organisation, the person might have a hoarding disorder. This great sense of disorganisation can lead to a very crowded and unsanitary living condition. Many hoarders can’t locate items in their home because there is too much clutter to enable them to effectively find any.

 

Gross Filth and Hoarding can cause significant issues to those living in this kind of environment with an increased level of pollutants in the air and biological risks with increased levels of mildew and mould growth as well as rodents, faeces and urine which can have severe health implications if not remediated. Additionally, living in a house with a gross filth, squaller or hoarding issue can lead to the increased risk of a fall and in some extreme cases, being trapped among the hoarding mess. Potential structural damage can occur to the property if the hoarding mess is left for an extended period of time and the risk of a house fire increases significantly.

Crime Scene Cleaners Perth technicians provide a compassionate and understanding gross filth and hoarders clean up service with a tactful, respectful and caring approach during the entire process and are able to encourage your loved one to find a happy and healthy balance between items that are important and have sentimental value to keep, and the items that are not needed.

There is no shame in this struggle, and you should never be made to feel bad about this. Our team will also keep our work entirely confidential.
